TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DiscoveryClientResult extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the details of a discovery reference without the contents of the referenced document. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Using the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A> method of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol>, all valid referenced documents and a file containing a map of all save documents can be written to disk. The file containing a map of all saved documents contains the details of each document as summarized by the properties of DiscoveryClientResult.
After the referenced documents and the map of the referenced documents have been written to disk using the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A> method, you can invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll%2A> method to read the discovery documents.
## Examples [!code-cpp[DiscoveryClientResult#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.web.services.di_12_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[DiscoveryClientResult#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.services.di_12_1.cs)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientResult#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.services.di_12_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public DiscoveryClientResult (Type referenceType, string url, string filename);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type referenceType, string url, string filename) cil managed

Docs.param: Name of the class representing the type of reference in the discovery document. Sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResult.ReferenceTypeName%2A> property.
URL for the reference. Sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResult.Url%2A> property.
Name of the file in which the reference was saved. Sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResult.Filename%2A> property.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class and sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResult.ReferenceTypeName%2A> property to , the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResult.Url%2A> property to and the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResult.Filename%2A> property to .
Gets or sets the name of the file in which the reference is saved.
Docs.value: Name of the file in which the reference is saved.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The name of the file is the name of the file saved on the local computer based on the contents of the file. For instance, if the referenced file is a discovery document, the saved file will have a.disco extension on a Windows operating system.
## Examples [!code-cs[DiscoveryClientResult_Filename#5](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.web.services.di_32_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[DiscoveryClientResult_Filename#5](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.web.services.di_32_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientResult_Filename#5](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.web.services.di_32_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Name of the class representing the type of reference in the discovery document.
Docs.value: Name of the class representing the type of a reference. Default value is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks A reference within a discovery document can contain references to service descriptions, XSD schemas, or other discovery documents. Therefore, ReferenceTypeName can have the following values: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>, <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>, and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>.
## Examples [!code-cs[DiscoveryClientResult_Filename#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.web.services.di_5_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[DiscoveryClientResult_Filename#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.web.services.di_5_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientResult_Filename#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.web.services.di_5_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the URL for the reference.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The URL can refer to a discovery document, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schema, or a Service Description.
